attributes.action: Call a fully open and transparent inquiry into the extent of the Grooming Gangs
attributes.additional_details: We would like Parliament to call a far reaching public inquiry
attributes.background: The ilsca children's inquiry did not go far enough in its investigation into the grooming gangs,the ethnicity of the perpetrators and the victims.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
